text: @leonardocarella @dhothersall My takeaway from this is: end lockdown for Telegraph correspondents . Give them all a 5G phone (but no 5G coverage!) and encourage them to all get together in a room in which all the surfaces have been liberally smeared with COVID-19 and there are no hand washing facilities!

domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain
